purpose: The email announces the first call for papers for the VMCAI 2026 conference, which will be held on January 12-13, 2026, in Rennes, France. It invites submissions of regular papers, tools papers, and case studies from researchers in the fields of Verification, Model Checking, and Abstract Interpretation. The submission deadline is set for September 10, 2025, with notifications of acceptance to be sent by November 6, 2025. Additional information can be found on the VMCAI 2026 website.

infos:
Subject: VMCAI 2026: first call for papers
From: SEWORLD Moderator <[log in to unmask]>
Reply-To:SEWORLD Moderator <[log in to unmask]>
Date:Wed, 16 Jul 2025 06:16:26 -0000
Content-Type:text/plain
VMCAI 2026 will take place during January 12-13, 2026 as a physical
(in-person) event in Rennes, France, co-located with POPL 2026.
For more information, please visit the VMCAI 2026 website:
